title: What are examples of Japanese technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are familiar, everyday Japanese inventions. Japanese inventions that changed the world In addition, below are more recent examples of Japanese technological innovations. Computer generated imagery (CGI)  Maglev  Hydrogen Fuel Cells  Robotics  Haptic controller  Augmented reality shopping  Touchable holograms  Custom garment measurement & fitting  Hydro membrane - growing plants (w/o soil) on thin film

The phrase “kata, kata chi” comes to mind where the pattern (kata) is perfected (kata chi) the overall idea being see something and take it to perfection. Many examples such as pottery (from Korea) Automobiles . the Yamato and Musashi were gorgeous battleships…..near useless but beautiful and sunk by (of course) airplanes from carriers. So perfection in this case means for the purpose then intended.
